info.name: Lichess: JI Shogi-Themed Chess (2-Kanji)
info.description: *NOTE: Support and updates for this theme has been discontinued. To get the most updated version with new feature(s) kindly visit JI Shogi-Themed Chess (2-Kanji). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Shogi-Themed Chess (Japanized Western Chess) on Lichess. Shogi (Japanese Chess) is the Japanese cousin of western chess and now you can play chess using shogi's board and 2-kanji pieces on Lichess. You can read more about it at JI Shogi-Themed Chess. Kindly check the 1-Kanji version as well. You can also visit JI Shogi-Themed Chess's Github repository.
info.additionalInfo: *NOTE: Support and updates for this theme has been discontinued. To get the most updated version with new feature(s) kindly visit JI Shogi-Themed Chess (2-Kanji). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Board and pieces included - Works with all variants - Works with matches, puzzles, analysis and board editor - Available in 2D ============ Updated June 19, 2024. Previous version no longer works as Lichess updated their codes. Kindly uninstall and reinstall if you have a version prior to June 19, 2024.
